Player History
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 4/4/1986 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Injured on 7/7/1986 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 7/29/1987 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles to Detroit on 8/4/1989 (Going to LAD: RF Tom Brunansky. Going to DET: LF Chris Gwynn, P Darrel Akerfelds, P Dave Pavlas, P Mike Maddux)...
Injured on 4/11/1990 with a Fractured Hip, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/4/1990, off Keith Brown (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/1991, off Mike Witt (SEA)...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
